help-file.title: WILDMAGE
help-file.content:
The chaos mage will draw power from beyond reality, from the realm of Chaos. This realm has immense power reserves but it is very hard to control. This will manifest itself by letting the mage get random results (often more powerful) when he casts his spell. The drawback is that he can loose control over the strong magic and harm random people in the room, be it friend of foe.
Innate Abilities --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 41st level: Wildmagic
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 12th circle: Chaotic Ripple
